name: Any Contact
author: Patrick Helbing

sections.description:
You can manage and edit all forms directly out of your WordPress Admin Center without any need of an external editor.

Requirements

  1. WordPress version 3.7 and later
  2. PHP Interpreter version 5.2.0 or later
  3. PHP GD Library (if you want to use the captcha)
sections.installation:
1. Uncompress the download package
  2. Upload folder including all files and sub directories to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

You will find ‘Any Contact’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.

For basic usage, you can also have a look at the plugin homepage.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Any Contact? Use these support channels appropriately.

  1. FAQ
  2. Support Forum
sections.changelog:
For more information, see Releases.

  • fix several bugs
  • add description
